name: Glock & Roll
description:
This game was made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam which had the theme: "Roll of the Dice".

Please see the in game "How to play" section for a guide on how to play.

NOTE: It is possible to outrun and therefore avoid the red enemies by keeping moving and bunny hopping around the map. The game is quite difficult but it is possible to score highly by using this and other techniques.
